title: Rebel Lexis
description: Surviving against all odds, Rebel Lexis's two main characters fight for their very lives in this action packed page turner.'The way you interweave technology in your writing is particularly brilliant...the book is ground breaking stuff on so many points...Jason has a sort of anti-hero feel to him...' Kelechi AguMasterfully crafted, Rebel Lexis is the first volume in the celebrated new ‘Rings of Polaris’ series fuses Science Fiction, Dystopian, and Action – in an adventure giving Arthur C. Clarke a run for his money. Readers, get ready to strap in with the Captain of the Chameleon on a fast, and exciting mission across the vast wasteland that of future Earth; while nobody will deny Science fiction’s timeless popularity, both readers and critics are currently crying out for wholly-unique new narratives that don’t succumb to recycling of the “same old” concepts. Thankfully, Paul Alan has stepped up to the plate with gusto, serving up a compelling new series.
